articles.author: Doric Sam
articles.title: Donovan Mitchell Says He Hasn't Slept Since Cavs' NBA Playoff Exit, Watched Game Twice - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Cleveland Cavaliers star guard Donovan Mitchell is having a hard time getting over Tuesday's Game 5 loss to the Indiana Pacers in the Eastern Conference Semifinals, which ended his season.
articles.content:
Cleveland Cavaliers star guard Donovan Mitchell is having a hard time getting over Tuesday's Game 5 loss to the Indiana Pacers in the Eastern Conference semifinals, which ended his season.
